response.overview: Ninja are everywhere: on TV, in novels, in non-fiction books, in magazines, in comics, in toys, even on t-shirts and in videogames. But they are especially in movies, where they slice, dice, and just generally kill everything in sight with everything in sight! Now, Richard Meyers takes you on a magic ninja ride through the astounding world of these esoteric killers.  See! Ninja with fists of fire!  See! Ninja with melting faces!  See! Ninja women mud wrestling!  All this and more in this amazing, action-packed video extravaganza that tells the fact and shows the fantasy of those epic, legendary assassins of the night: NINJA MANIA!
response.title: Ninja Mania
